name: Deep One Scion Priest of Cthulhu

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The deep one can breath air and water

traits.name: Deep Dweller
entries: The deep one has advantage on stealth checks while underwater. In additon, it can't be harmed by water pressure

traits.name: Use Magic Device
entries: ignores all class requirements on the use of magic items

traits.name: Eminence of the Void
entries: as a bonus action, the deep one bishop can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to deal an extra 3d6 force damage to a target on a hit. The weapon attack is magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the bishop expends a spell slot of 2nd or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

traits.name: Spellcasting
entries: is a 8th level spell caste. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom spell save DC 15, +7 to hitwith spell attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep one makes two claw attacks

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 1d6+2 slashing damage
